src/webhooks/dto/evolution-webhook.dto.t.description: Evolution API webhook DTOs created with class-validator decorators. Contains EvolutionMessagesUpsertWebhookDto (for incoming messages), EvolutionConnectionUpdateWebhookDto (for connection state changes), and EvolutionWebhookDto (base class for event type detection). Uses class-transformer @Type decorator for nested object validation.

src/webhooks/webhooks.controller.ts.description: Evolution API webhook endpoint added at @Post('evolution'). Uses EvolutionWebhookGuard for validation. Handles messages.upsert events by extracting phone from remoteJid (stripping @s.whatsapp.net/@c.us/@g.us suffixes), extracting message content from various message types, and routing to GHL via ghlService.sendToPlatform(). Skips fromMe messages to avoid echo loops.
